settings.title: Fast, Free Shipping
settings.content:
We offer free shipping straight to your door throughout the contiguous US*. It usually takes 3-7 business days* for your package to be delivered, so you can sit back and relax, worry-free.

*Please see our shipping policy for more details.

*Due to COVID-19 shipping times may be delayed.

settings.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
settings.content:
Get a full refund when you return your undamaged products within 30 days - for any reason. Once the item arrives back at the eufy warehouse for inspection, the refund process will begin.

See our refund policy for more details about what is needed for a smooth refund process..

settings.title: Hassle-free Warranty
settings.content:
eufy provides a straightforward, hassle-free warranty to save you some headaches. All pre-owned and refurbished products come with their own unique warranty that you can find on the product listing or contact us at support@eufylife.com with your order receipt for confirmation.

This limited warranty provided by the manufacturer in no way affects a potential statutory warranty provided by law.

settings.title: Lifetime Customer Support
settings.content:
We'll Always be There for You.

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact us at support@eufylife.com.

settings.name: Automatical Night Vision
settings.title: Free Up Your Stress, From Dawn to Dusk
settings.content: Automatic night vision allows you to see from top to toe clearly in the dark of the night, without visible IR LEDS to disturb your baby's sleep.

settings.name: 360° Monitoring
settings.title: No More Blind Spots
settings.content:
Pan , tilt , zoom - you name it . Check in on your baby
in full view and magnify details whenever you need it.

settings.name: Sleep Tracker
settings.title: Be in 4 places at once
settings.content: With 4 cameras, you can view your little ones one at a time, 4 on a split screen, or set it on Auto Switch to view 4 cameras by turns in every 5-30 seconds.

settings.name: 2-Way Audio Intercom
settings.title: 2-Way Audio Intercom
settings.content: Sometimes all your baby needs is to hear your voice. The convenient built-in microphone and speaker allows you to quickly and remotely soothe your baby, providing a full sense of security. So you can enjoy a peaceful morning in the kitchen or elsewhere in the home.

settings.title: Get a KAWA baby monitor, get a balanced work-life.
settings.content: You will have the freedom to attend to other tasks in your life, such as cooking, cleaning the baby bottles, doing yoga, reading, working, and sleeping. Enjoy time for yourself while keeping an eye on your baby.

settings.title: KAWA baby camera monitor can offer you peace of mind.
settings.content: It is easy to feel chaotic or anxious whether you’re a first-time parent or growing your family, especially when you need to work while taking care of your baby.

settings.title: From Day to Night
settings.content:
Built-in 4,000mAh rechargeable battery provides 20-hour monitoring. Check out your baby at any time with ease.

If the screen is on for an entire day, it can last up to 10 hours.

settings.title: No WIFI No App
settings.content: KAWA baby monitors with camera uses an encrypted 2.4GHz FHSS radio signal, risks of hacking and security breach do not exist. No WiFi baby monitor is a solid choice for 100% privacy and security. Very easy to use.

settings.title: Instant Sound Alert
settings.content: A built-in microphone can pick up low sound up to 20ft away for louder volume and crisper audio in your baby’s room. Get alerted immediately when your baby needs you via the advanced sound detection technology.

settings.title: Room Temperature Sensor
settings.content: Built-in temperature sensor can monitor the temperature of baby nursery in real-time throughout the day. It will notify you with sound alert and message when the temp exceeds the set range. Ensure your baby is in a comfortable environment.

settings.title: Prefect for New Mom/Parent
settings.content: You will get a changeable yellow deer camera cover as a gift. Infants will not be afraid of the camera, instead, they will have fun with our cutest baby camera.

settings.title: VOX Sleep/Wake
settings.content: Smart VOX mode will turn the monitor screen on when it detects a sudden voice, like crying or shouting from the baby. When you are needed, you will know instantly.

settings.title: Remote Pan Tilt Zoom & Service
settings.content: See every inch of your baby’s room with pan 350°, tilt 67° and 110° wide angle view. One press digital 2x zoom let you see your baby up close.

settings.title: Lullaby & White Noise
settings.content: 6 soothing lullabies can create a sound environment for your baby's deep sleep, transport your little one into dreamland. Plus the white noise for parents to get a good night's sleep, brings you more energy to take care of your loved one.

settings.question: Is eufy Baby Smart Sock safe for my baby?
settings.solution: Yes, eufy Baby Smart Sock is safe for daily use with your baby when used as instructed. The sensor tracks your baby's sleep via light reflections (PPG technology) and baby's movements. The sock uses high-quality fabric that wraps comfortably on your baby's feet. All components of the smart sock are carefully selected and manufactured with quality in mind. We have collaborated with parents like you and engaged in rigorous tests to make sure the sock is safe for all.

settings.question: Does the device generate any radio emmisions that would harm my baby?
settings.solution: Smart Sock is not harmful to the baby as it has been tested and meets the applicable limits for radio frequency (RF) exposure. The sock connects with the base periodically via Bluetooth Low Energy 5.0 (2.4GHz) that has low power output. The base and camera connect to your phone via Wi-Fi like any other Wi-Fi-connected devices in your room.

settings.question: Will Smart Sock cause a choking hazard to my baby?
settings.solution: Smart Sock is safe for your baby and meets the safety standards. As a precaution, keep the sock sensor away from your baby's mouth.

settings.question: How many sock sizes are included in the box?
settings.solution: Smart Sock comes in 3 sizes that fit most children up to 18 months old or weigh up to 30 lb. All sizes are symmetrical and can be worn on either foot..

settings.title: Clear & Color, Even at Night or from Afar
settings.description: With 5-megapixel resolution and built-in spotlights, this smart IP camera keeps recording in full color day and night. Even better, you can zoom in optically to find more details.

settings.title: Pet Monitor
settings.content: Get clear and stable live-stream from anywhere
